references.paper_title: SemanticKITTI: A dataset for semantic scene understanding of lidar sequences
references.reason: It is the main dataset used for training and evaluating the proposed model in this paper, demonstrating the model's performance on a standard benchmark.

references.paper_title: SqueezeSeg: Convolutional neural nets with recurrent crf for real-time road-object segmentation from 3d lidar point cloud
references.reason: It is a seminal work that introduced the use of spherical projection to convert 3D LiDAR point clouds into 2D images for efficient semantic segmentation, laying the foundation for many subsequent methods.

references.paper_title: RangeNet++: Fast and Accurate LiDAR Semantic Segmentation
references.reason: It proposed a post-processing approach to handle information loss in 2D projection-based methods by restoring dropped points through KNN, serving as a comparison method for the proposed novel technique.

references.paper_title: PointNet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: This paper introduces PointNet++, a crucial deep learning architecture for processing point cloud data, upon which the proposed Frustum Farthest Point Sampling (F2PS) method is partially based.

references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: It is another important dataset used to evaluate the proposed model, showcasing its generalization capabilities across different datasets and driving scenarios.
